content: go to the Stripe customer portal

comment.text: This translation key is used to translate a link that directs users to the Stripe customer portal. It appears as an account link on the Payer Information Container in Portal Settings. The translator should provide a neutral description that can be used by users of different languages and regions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'отидете на Stripe портала за клиенти' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be 'достъп до Stripe портала за клиенти' or 'въведете Stripe портала за клиенти'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: достъп до Stripe портала за клиенти

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'go to' is not accurately translated. 'μεταβείτε' implies a formal movement or transition, which might be too formal for a customer portal link. 'Πήγαινε' or 'Επισκέψου' would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: μεταβείτε -> πήγαινε στην πύλη πελατών της Stripe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "գնալ Stripe հաճախորդների պորտալ" is a literal translation and may not be the most natural way to say 'go to the Stripe customer portal' in Armenian.  It could sound slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like "բացել Stripe հաճախորդների պորտալը" (open the Stripe customer portal) or "մուտք գործել Stripe հաճախորդների պորտալ" (access the Stripe customer portal).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ໄປທີ່ແຜງບໍລິການລູກຄ້າ Stripe" while conveying a similar idea, doesn't directly translate 'go to'. 'ແຜງບໍລິການລູກຄ້າ' is 'customer service panel', not 'customer portal'. A more accurate translation would incorporate the meaning of 'portal'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "ໄປທີ່ເວັບໄຊ້ບໍລິການລູກຄ້າ Stripe" (go to the Stripe customer website/portal) or "ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບໃນເວັບໄຊ້ບໍລິການລູກຄ້າ Stripe" (log in to the Stripe customer website/portal).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'salt la portalul de client Stripe' is not the most accurate or natural translation of "go to the Stripe customer portal". 'Salt' means 'jumps' or 'leaps'. A more appropriate translation would involve a verb indicating navigation or access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: mergi la portalul de client Stripe

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'customer' is transliterated as 'පාරිභෝගික'. While understandable, 'පාරිශ්‍රමික' might be a more common and accurate translation in this context, as it refers to a client or consumer.

The phrase "идите на Stripe портал за купце" is not an accurate translation of "go to the Stripe customer portal."  'Идите' (idite) means 'go' (imperative, informal, plural/polite singular), but it's not appropriate here. 'За купце' (za kupce) translates to 'for customers,' but 'customer' has a more specific meaning. The term 'клијентски портал' (klijentski portal) is more accurate for 'customer portal'.

While not a severe error, using the imperative form 'идите' is less formal than generally preferred in user interface copy. A more formal and generally preferred form would be 'пређите на Stripe клијентски портал'.

The translation 'idite na Stripe portal za kupce' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'go to the Stripe customer portal.' While technically correct, it's a bit literal. A more idiomatic translation would convey the meaning better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'povežite se sa Stripe portalom za kupce' or 'odlazak na Stripe portal za kupce' or 'idite na Stripe portal'
